text:
e="preserve">Juan de Dios Castro Lozano (25 March 1942 – 24 November 2020) was a Mexican lawyer and politician. He was a member of the National Action Party. He was a member of the Congress of the Union between 1979 to 1985, 1991 to 2000 and 2003 to 2006. Castro Lozano was born in Torreón, Coahuila.
He also was President of the Chamber of Deputies from 2003 to 2004.
Castro Lozano died on 24 November 2020 from COVID-19 in Mexico City, aged 78.

annotations.surface_form: President of the Chamber of Deputies
